mapper.sql: id, type, dindex, name, ctype, query, cip, room, remark
mapper.select: select type from igrs_device where room=#{room} group by type
select * from igrs_device group by type
select d.type,d.dindex,d.ctype,d.cip,d.room,s.attribute,d.query,s.value,s.cchannel,s.device from igrs_device_status s,igrs_device d where s.device in (select id from igrs_device) and d.id=s.device

select d.id,d.type,d.dindex,d.ctype,d.cip,d.room,s.attribute,s.value,s.cchannel from igrs_device_status s,igrs_device d where s.device in (select id from igrs_device where room=#{room}) and d.id=s.device

select d.id,d.type,d.dindex,d.ctype,d.cip,d.room,s.attribute,s.value,s.cchannel from igrs_device_status s,igrs_device d where d.id=s.device and d.type=#{type} and d.room in (select room from igrs_user_room where user=(select id from igrs_user where user=#{user}))
select a.* ,b.* from igrs_device_status a,igrs_device b where a.device = b.id and a.attribute = 'switch' and b.type = #{type}

select d.id,d.type,d.dindex,d.ctype,d.cip,d.room,s.attribute,s.value,s.cchannel from igrs_device_status s,igrs_device d where d.id=s.device and d.type=#{type} and d.room in (select distinct room from igrs_user_room)
select * from igrs_device where room=#{room} and type=#{type}
select * from igrs_device where room=#{room} and ctype=#{clientType}
select d.*,s.attribute,s.cchannel from igrs_device d, igrs_device_status s where d.room=#{room} and d.type=#{type} and d.dindex=#{index} and d.id=s.device
